name: GM Premium Hotel
address: 41 Hàng Bông, Hoàn Kiếm , Hà Nội, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Với hồ bơi ngoài trời, trung tâm thể dục và quầy bar, GM Premium Hotel nằm ở trung tâm Hà Nội, cách Nhà thờ Thánh Joseph 4 phút đi bộ. Khách sạn 4 sao này có dịch vụ tiền sảnh và bàn bán tour. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Các căn tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Các phòng đều đi kèm với ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có sân hiên và một số khác thì nhìn ra thành phố. Tại GM Premium Hotel, tất cả các phòng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu Á mỗi sáng.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long, Hồ Hoàn Kiếm và Ô Quan Chưởng. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách GM Premium Hotel 24 km.

review.comment_positive:
Mình được upgrade lên phòng có view trực diện đường phố rất đẹp. 
Các bạn nhân viên rất nhiệt tình và không ngại giúp đỡ. Mình chưa thấy nhân viên khách sạn nào lại siêu nhiệt tình và hỗ trợ đến thế.
review.comment_negative: Nên thay mùi tinh dầu trong phòng vệ sinh xho mùi nào thoáng và thơm nhẹ hơn mùi hiện tại không hợp, nồng

review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel in a prime location. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Could not have been more impressed with our stay

The location and the staff were fantastic. They do ask you to google review the restaurant etc often as they get paid extra if you do and their manager sees it but that means your not doing tips all the time. 
I could not fault their care and customer service. 
I would recommend booking trips through them as everything was so easy before we got there. 
Food in the hotel was fantastic.
review.comment_negative: The pool was rather smaller but still lovely to dip and cool off, no Sun loungers.

review.comment_positive: Location ,staff was outstanding on every level

The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. They loved to talk about what we were up to for the day and how our day was, when we returned. It was really welcoming - like coming home to family, from an outing. Location was great. We walked everywhere. They held our luggage while we went to Ha Long Bay for 2 nights. Lobby was beautiful. Breakfast was great, ordered eggs & pancakes. Also, loved the Vietnamese iced coffees!
review.comment_negative: We had travelled Vietnam for a few weeks and never came across VAT and Service charges-both were charged at the hotel. We were surprised by these, so chose to drink and eat at other venues, so the additional charges didn’t apply.

review.rating: Amazing little hotel in the middle of Old Quarter.
review.comment_positive: Outstanding hospitality and service. Helped me out with every little thing.
review.comment_negative: Hospitality and location.

review.room_type: Phòng Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive:
This hotel is so lovely in every way, staff are outstanding, rooms feel luxurious (great beds), great breakfast & food. So central for Hanoi old quarter. Sky brunch bar did a fabulous lunch when you want to be away from the hustle & bustle.
Miss Vivian & all the staff are what make the warm character & feel of this place, they go above & beyond which I feel is their point of difference.
My children felt very welcome & did not want to leave. Thank you all for making our Hanoi experience exceptional.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing from the moment we arrived, the room was spotless and cleaned every day. They arranged everything for us from the transfer from the airport to our trip on the elite of the sea to halong bay that made our holiday it was fantastic.
review.comment_negative: There was no room around the pool

review.rating: We enjoyed our night here and found the staff charming.
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was v calming in all the chaos of Hanoi!
Nice rooftop bar.
Might have been a bit more choice in breakfast fare.
review.comment_negative: Nothing,

review.rating: Quick one night stay that wish was longer

This hotel is so lovely in every way, staff are outstanding, rooms feel luxurious (great beds), great breakfast & food. So central for Hanoi old quarter. Sky brunch bar did a fabulous lunch when you want to be away from the hustle & bustle.
Miss Vivian & all the staff are what make the warm character & feel of this place, they go above & beyond which I feel is their point of difference.
My children felt very welcome & did not want to leave. Thank you all for making our Hanoi experience exceptional.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing from the moment we arrived, the room was spotless and cleaned every day. They arranged everything for us from the transfer from the airport to our trip on the elite of the sea to halong bay that made our holiday it was fantastic.
review.comment_negative: There was no room around the pool

review.rating: We enjoyed our night here and found the staff charming.
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was v calming in all the chaos of Hanoi!
Nice rooftop bar.
Might have been a bit more choice in breakfast fare.
review.comment_negative: Nothing,

review.rating: Quick one night stay that wish was longer
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Staff friendlessness and helpful.
Rooftop bar
Location of hotel
Bed comfortable
Good shower
review.comment_negative: Not a dislike, just hard to open case as not a lot of floor space

review.comment_positive:
Mình được upgrade lên phòng có view trực diện đường phố rất đẹp. 
Các bạn nhân viên rất nhiệt tình và không ngại giúp đỡ. Mình chưa thấy nhân viên khách sạn nào lại siêu nhiệt tình và hỗ trợ đến thế.
review.comment_negative: Nên thay mùi tinh dầu trong phòng vệ sinh xho mùi nào thoáng và thơm nhẹ hơn mùi hiện tại không hợp, nồng

review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel in a prime location. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Could not have been more impressed with our stay

The location and the staff were fantastic. They do ask you to google review the restaurant etc often as they get paid extra if you do and their manager sees it but that means your not doing tips all the time. 
I could not fault their care and customer service. 
I would recommend booking trips through them as everything was so easy before we got there. 
Food in the hotel was fantastic.
review.comment_negative: The pool was rather smaller but still lovely to dip and cool off, no Sun loungers.

review.comment_positive: Location ,staff was outstanding on every level

The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. They loved to talk about what we were up to for the day and how our day was, when we returned. It was really welcoming - like coming home to family, from an outing. Location was great. We walked everywhere. They held our luggage while we went to Ha Long Bay for 2 nights. Lobby was beautiful. Breakfast was great, ordered eggs & pancakes. Also, loved the Vietnamese iced coffees!
review.comment_negative: We had travelled Vietnam for a few weeks and never came across VAT and Service charges-both were charged at the hotel. We were surprised by these, so chose to drink and eat at other venues, so the additional charges didn’t apply.

review.rating: Amazing little hotel in the middle of Old Quarter.
review.comment_positive: Outstanding hospitality and service. Helped me out with every little thing.
review.comment_negative: Hospitality and location.

I would recommend booking trips through them as everything was so easy before we got there. 
Food in the hotel was fantastic.
review.comment_negative: The pool was rather smaller but still lovely to dip and cool off, no Sun loungers.

review.comment_positive: Location ,staff was outstanding on every level

The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. They loved to talk about what we were up to for the day and how our day was, when we returned. It was really welcoming - like coming home to family, from an outing. Location was great. We walked everywhere. They held our luggage while we went to Ha Long Bay for 2 nights. Lobby was beautiful. Breakfast was great, ordered eggs & pancakes. Also, loved the Vietnamese iced coffees!
review.comment_negative: We had travelled Vietnam for a few weeks and never came across VAT and Service charges-both were charged at the hotel. We were surprised by these, so chose to drink and eat at other venues, so the additional charges didn’t apply.

review.comment_positive:
This hotel is so lovely in every way, staff are outstanding, rooms feel luxurious (great beds), great breakfast & food. So central for Hanoi old quarter. Sky brunch bar did a fabulous lunch when you want to be away from the hustle & bustle.
Miss Vivian & all the staff are what make the warm character & feel of this place, they go above & beyond which I feel is their point of difference.
My children felt very welcome & did not want to leave. Thank you all for making our Hanoi experience exceptional.
